mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_NO /* prGoodsItemInfo.getGoodsItemList */ , GOODS_NOTI_LISART_CD , GOODS_NOTI_ITEM_CD , NOTI_ITEM_CMT , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_ITEM_INFO WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo}
